trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 類別定義 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的收件者。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建構 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> 建構函式使用指定的收件者憑證，建構 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient>類別具有下列的預設屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: null 參考已傳遞至不接受它做為有效引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯作業無法完成。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 列舉型別的成員，指定收件者的識別項型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> 建構函式使用指定的收件者識別項型別和收件者憑證，建構 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: null 參考已傳遞至不接受它做為有效引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯作業無法完成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> 屬性會擷取與收件者關聯的憑證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> 物件，含有與收件者關聯的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> 屬性會擷取收件者的識別項型別。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 列舉型別的成員，指定收件者的識別項型別。
